title: Topic 005 Question 009
body: You have a Microsoft 365 tenant that has Modern authentication enabled for all services. Multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enforced for all users.
You are deploying Microsoft Teams Rooms.
The first time you attempt to sign in to a Teams Rooms, you receive an error message indicating that the device cannot sign in to Teams.
You verify that Modern authentication is enabled in Teams Rooms.
What prevents you from signing in?
options: Teams Rooms must be domain-joined first.
MFA is unsupported in Teams Rooms.
The Teams Rooms account is not licensed for Microsoft Intune.
The Microsoft Authenticator app is not configured for the Teams Rooms account.
